Posts.Content: Hi A68  I'm in the same situation as you . I'm going into my hospital Monday. It's called The OneStop Breast Clinic.  You spend all day there and get a plan of action that day. Blood test Biopsies Scans done all that day.  It's a every worrying time isn't it.  Can't just put it to the back of your mind and carry on. I try to be positive be it's very hard. My husband is supportive but my parents are not. It's keep smiling both of us xx.
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results and have had appointment letter .

Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results and have had appointment letter .

Posts.Content: HiA68 Sorry to hear you still have not got your answers yet.  It must be very stressful !!!  That's what my consultants are doing with me. I went in Monday but they couldn't do everything so I got to go back this Monday again. They too are looking at DCIS. Hopefully you will have all your results on 20th and yes you should ask your consultant about the other lump, they are the specialist. Let me know how things go. Keep well. Big hugs x
